TopicTitle: 77 Industries: Armoured Warfare Division - New Main Battle Tank!

Articles.Content:
**77 Industries presents:**

**BDAZ1 Main Battle Tank**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/PQQAz)

Crew: 3

Mass: 34.7t

Weaponry: 120mm cannon, 40 shells.

Range: 100km+

Armour: All around, two layers

Suspension: Independent, able to climb over and drive through very rough terrain (limit speed).

Download Link: [http://kerbalx.com/crafts/3966](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/3966)

Stay tuned for more hardware!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-05T22:10:29Z" title="08/05/2015 10:10  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 5, 2015</time> by Azimech**

Released today:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/CouCs)

With my SuperSuspensionTM 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wIaRZVsKX8k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Crew: 3

Mass: 37.7t

Weaponry: 120mm cannon, 40 shells; 4x .50cal turrets, 2400 rounds.

Range: 300km

Armour: All around, two layers, at the front four layers.

Suspension: Independent, able to climb over and drive through very rough terrain (limit speed). Capable of driving with 12 of the 14 wheels broken!

Download link: [http://kerbalx.com/crafts/4249](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/4249)
